item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Sound it out Online portal to generate audio books from documents Clipboard A c# library that provides the ability to extract text from various document file formats SSLEngine A c# library that provides the ability to execute OpenSSL commands ANTLR python compiler Custom language compiler built in java that generates python using ANTLR4

item.title: Free hosting with GitHub pages
item.description: With the use of GitHub pages and Cloudflare, it is very possible to host your own static website over HTTPS for free. However, there are a few pre-requisites: A GitHub account (register here) A CloudFlare account (register here) An installation of Hugo (Optional) Once you have signed up to both of the services the first thing to do is create yourself a new GitHub repository Setting up GitHub Pages Step 1 - Create a new repository First, we need to create a new GitHub repository, use a name with the following naming convention: <your username/organisation>.

item.title: Career
item.description: Degree apprentice University of essex Whilst in my role as a junior developer I was given the opportunity to enter a degree apprenticeship program. 2016-10-12 Juinior web developer Atlas Computer Systems Ltd After successfully completing my apprenticeship I was promoted to junior. 2015-07-21 Apprentice web developer Atlas Computer Systems Ltd This was my introduction into the world of programming. 2014-07-21
